Original:
整體服務很棒但有一位店員一直酸言酸語
拿著小的紅酒杯的那位 我們唱完歌會不耐煩的臉說：你們幹嘛不降兩個key?

我們六位，其中三位都點超過低消再多一杯一手酒，真的不算多，但有必要這樣說話嗎？期間你也到了我們兩次酒到你的小酒杯，這樣的體驗毀了你們所有人的努力，有這位員工應該是不會再去了。

The overall service is great, but a clerk has been sour
The face with a small red wine glass, who we sang, said impatiently, said, "Why don't you lower two Key?"

Then it ended at 5:30. The boss enthusiastically gave three bottles of Baili. We played the three bottles to finish drinking the dice. He also drifted over and said: Do you play without wine?

We six, three of them have more than one more glass of wine, which is really not too much, but is it necessary to speak like this?During this time, you also have to drink twice to your small wine glass. This experience ruins the efforts of all of you. Some employees should not go again.
